metadata.name: FIGHT4HOPE - PHYSICAL #1/1
metadata.description:
The original oil painting of FIGHT4HOPE. Includes both the original oil and an NFT of the physical oil painting on its easel. 

A resistance fighter, surrounded by an army of anons, fights for our right to transact, to own digital goods, and to live our digital lives.

Medium: Oil on linen mounted to panel, digitally enhanced.
Size: 11 x 14 inch, unframed.
Year: 2023
